p.s: The excerpt firstly starts with the reader reading how Emily and Isaac almost kiss each other (p. 71, l. 12-13).
Secondly, the author Ayad Akhtar describes how they are coughtcaught cheating by Isaac's wife (p. 71, l. 18-19 + 30).
After that the reader learns that Jory told Amir the truth, that she is going to get the partner position instead of Amir.
Which makes Amir really upset (p. 71, l. 23-25 + p. 72, l. 22-30 + p. 73, l. 4-13).
Because Amir gets really upset Isaac tries to defend his wife by starting a fight with Amir.
This fight suddenly ends when Amir spits Isaac in the face (p. 72, l. 38-39).
This gesture of Amir spitting Isaac in the face is really hurtfullhurtful for Jewish people exactly like in the story he told them before about his first crush.
At the end the reader reads that Emily tells Amir the truth, that she sleeptslept with Isaac in London (p. 73, l. 31 + p. 74, l. 4).
Whereupon Amir starts to hit Emily in the face out of pure anger, until he realises what he is doing (p. 74, l. 5-14).
The scene ends, when Abe comes in and sees what Amir has done (p. 74, l. 16-24).
